image

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • image.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageInterface

    public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageInterface
    A class who represents Image's functions
    The values are between 0 and 255
    Author:
    DEROISSART Maxime | MEIGNANT Pierrick | ROUTIER Jean-Christophe

      • getPixel

        public Pixel getPixel(int x,
                      int y)
               throws UnknownPixelException
        gets pixel at coord (x,y) of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
        Specified by:
        getPixel in interface ImageInterface
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal coordinate
        y - the vertical coordinate
        Returns:
        pixel at coord x,y of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
        Throws:
        UnknownPixelException - if pixel of coord (x,y) does not exist

      • edge

        public Image edge(int threshold)
        Return a new image according to the threshold
        When the difference between pixel's neighbors on his right OR under him are greater than the threshold, he becames BLACK.
        Parameters:
        threshold - the threshold
        Returns:
        a new image with threshold applicated

      • decreaseNbGrayLevels

        public Image decreaseNbGrayLevels(int nbGrayLevels)
        Return a new image according to the nbGrayLevels
        Decrease the level of grey of the image according to nbGrayLevels
        Parameters:
        nbGrayLevels - the power of two used for the decrement
        Returns:
        a new image with decrementation applicated

      • initImagePGM

        public static Image initImagePGM(java.lang.String fileName)
        Reads a PGM image from file. It is assumed that file respects the following PGM file syntax:
        • first line with string "P2"
        • second line : a comment
        • one int for width w, one int for heighth
        • one int for max gray level (not used here, we consider this level to be 255 in our images)
        • w x h integers between 0 and max (for us max=255) for each pixel
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the image file in PGM format
        Returns:
        the image built from the file

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
